name: RefPointer_getRefNameTest
description: Unit tests for the getRefName method of the RefPointer class.

test_cases.name: testGetRefName_NullRef
test_cases.description: Tests the getRefName method with a null reference.

test_cases.name: testGetRefName_SecuritySchemes
test_cases.description: Tests the getRefName method with a reference to security schemes.

test_cases.name: testGetRefName_ValidRef
test_cases.description: Tests the getRefName method with a valid reference.

test_cases.name: testGetRefName_InvalidRef
test_cases.description: Tests the getRefName method with an invalid reference, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
